message:
ده سيرفر بسيط ديسكتوب بيserve المشروعات الstatic و ممكن تشير على الNetwork و تعمل اكتر من سيرفر فى نفس الوقت و كده.
اعتقد هاينفع فى انك تشير كمان فولدر على الnetwork
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
Mostafa Hussein take your pick from those

https://gist.github.com/willurd/5720255

Most notably are Ruby:

ruby -run -e httpd . -p 8081

And Python 2:

python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8081
python -m http.server 8081 # for Python 3

Coupled with an ssh tunnel https://ngrok.com/ and you get the same thing.

That's not resilient though. They also seem to be using localtunnel, which requires a Javascript environment setup on your box, then you can easily get it via npm. ngrok is written in Go, so you get a single executable binary for your arch. without any dependencies.

For Linux

> cd mydir
> python -m SimpleHTTPServer
^ That still doesn't solve exposing that directory to the outside world.
**بيشيل اللايك عشان مفيش نسخة لينوكس من البرنامج :D**
Or as i mentioned above ngrok and lose the nodejs dependency.
